profile.introduction: I'm a passionate python developer with a strong background in **Development(DevOps)** and software engineering. I love building scalable web applications and exploring new technologies.

timelineItems.description:
Developing FastAPI-based RESTful APIs and production-ready services to enable product integrations with LLMs and third-party platforms.
Designed and implemented secure integration patterns for generative-AI workflows, including notebooks ‚Üí API conversions and model orchestration.
Built and maintained webhook/connectors for messaging integrations (WhatsApp) and implemented restrictive access controls to protect sensitive operations.
Testing services and deployed prototypes to Cloud Run; collaborated with cross-functional product teams to ship end-to-end features.

Conducted market research and SWOT analysis focused on higher education in Tamil Nadu  identified and profiled 400+ engineering colleges for strategic reporting.
Built ETL pipelines to collect data from public sources using the requests library and BeautifulSoup for HTML parsing and validation.
Designed and delivered interactive Tableau dashboards and Excel-based reports to visualize findings and support data-driven decisions.

Performed library and web research to collect and validate television serial metadata for Nettv4u's catalog.
Automated Wikipedia scraping workflows and consolidated results into Excel data sources validated serial details against Nettv4u pages to ensure accuracy.
Developed internal data validation routines and documentation to improve the reliability of the content ingestion pipeline.
Intensive coding bootcamp focused on full-stack development and startup skills.
Comprehensive computer science education with focus on software engineering and algorithms.

hero.description: I build robust, high-performance APIs and intelligent agents using Python and FastAPI and managing CI/CD pipelines for seamless delivery. Passionate about SaaS, driven by a keen eye for building product.
